tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenomicInfo ( 
    protein_sequence VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    gene VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    mutation VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    PRIMARY KEY (protein_sequence) 
)

CREATE TABLE ProteinGeneMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_id INT,
    gene_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (protein_id) REFERENCES ProteinSequences(protein_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id)
);
